snippet.title: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX - DLC Information
snippet.description:
Brand new DLC content is coming to Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX! Take on the most eXtreme challenge in the game with a new boss encounter "vs ???" , and listen to Lola's newest hit single "Raison d'être" in her brand new concert outfit! 

Enjoy the promotional campaign until 1/1/2020 and download both items for free! After 1/1/2020, each item will be available for $1.99.

Official Website: http://gunvolt.com/en/X

Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX takes place in the universe of the “Azure Striker Gunvolt” (2014) and “Azure Striker Gunvolt 2” (2016) titles.

Since its inception, the Gunvolt series has become known among fans for its high-speed, stylish 2D action. This game will see series rival/anti-hero Copen take the lead and push the series’ speed and intensity to the next level, all the while keeping the game accessible to new fans. 

Title: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX
Platforms: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Steam
Genre: Action
Rating: T - Teen
Players: 1
Release Date: 9/26/2019
Price: $14.99 USD

©INTI CREATES CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
